subject: FW: [ALERT] Possible error on your SYD TRADE - Proposal Acceptance >> Xero Draft Invoice >> V2 Zap!
preview: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Heath Maguire
Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Hi Joel,


Adam from our accounts department is receiving error messages from Zapier;


ALERT] Possible error on your SYD TRADE - Proposal Acceptance >> Xero Draft Invoice >> V2 Zap!


I have logged into the marketing Zapier account, and cannot see any problems, but I'm not sure if we have another Zapier account that services the Sydney Trades -Proposal Acceptance


Can you look into this, and let me know if there are any issues?


Many Thanks


Kerri Fuchs

MARKETING SPECIALIST

kfuchs@novaricollective.com

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au


­­­








From: Andrea Albiez <aalbiez@novaricollective.com>
Date: Wednesday, 25 September 2024 at 7:31 am

Cc: Adam Fonseca <afonseca@novaricollective.com>
Subject: FW: [ALERT] Possible error on your SYD TRADE - Proposal Acceptance >> Xero Draft Invoice >> V2 Zap!

Hi Kerri,

Adam is receiving error messages from Zapier. Can you please look into this (with Heath if needed)?


Kind regards,
Andrea

Andrea Albiez

GENERAL MANAGER

0411 114 778 | aalbiez@novaricollective.com

Adam Fonseca
